description: Which of the following best demonstrates broken access control?
hint: Access control is about minimising access to certain features/information to those not mean to use/view it.
flag: A user is able to access a friend's photos by entering their email address
a: A user is not required to log in to view the home page of a blog
b: A user is able to access a friend's photos by entering their email address
c: An administrator is able to reset other user's passwords
d: A user is unable to connect to a server without an SSH key
